content:
<rule id="test-frameworks-sauge-00170" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <file filename="jpa-matchers{*}.jar"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Embedded framework - JPA Matchers">
                    <description>The application embeds the JPA Matchers library.</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">JPA Matchers</technology-tag>
            </perform>
        </rule>
